https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sUvg4XxnYGd3qZAPkht9tcU4H5u.jpg After serving 20 years in prison for the murder of his daughter, a crime for which he was wrongly imprisoned, Frank returns to his backwoods hometown. Old wounds and rumors of the past resurface and haunt him as he tries to find out who really killed her. Crimson Point
